name: Nuclear_STAR
description:
Get full satisfaction by destroying all Space jellies :) unlimited fun until you die ;)Controls,  A,S,D,W - movement                         Left mouse  - Shoot Relentlessly  *satisfying juicy gameplay *Pixel art *interacive SFX

*no music (no time for that btw)

used : Godot, Krita, SFXR, incscape 

If you like my game plz support financially whatever you can. That will boost my Hardwork :))) Enjoy While Playing
